@tomascooking There were a number of questions he supposedly asked in the elevator. All of them were to determine if an employees value was positive or negative ROI. Each story does conclude with a story of someone getting fired.
@marksbirch “You’re promoted”

Apple Inc lore, If you were in the elevator and Steve Jobs also joined, be ready to answer: “How do you make me money?” 

If you didn’t have a good answer, pack your desk, before HR escorts you out 

Unsure how true this is, but the lesson is real: always have a value prop ready

Met a ton of people at Consensus. Few use business cards and LinkedIn is stale. We use Telegram. 

I took a screenshot of my Telegram QR code and made it my phone Lock Screen for fast access to connect. 

They open camera, photo, we’re connected on chat and followup. #web3
